rules_text:
When this enchantment enters, create two 1/1 white Citizen creature tokens.
Whenever you attack, target attacking creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of creatures you control that aren't attacking.
notes:
!tokens white Citizen 11EIW<2>

An explosive deck that puts a lot of tokens into play and then buffs them.
art4
Full Weft shutdown in 12 hours. Be good to each other. Execs out.
